query.name: location_equipment_details
query.sql:
SELECT &ifp_equipment;.*, &ifp_equipment_types;.name, &ifp_location_equipment;.location_id, (&ifp_locations;.name) as location_address_name,
FROM (&ifp_equipment;, &ifp_equipment_types;, &ifp_location_equipment;, &ifp_locations;)
WHERE &ifp_equipment;.equipment_type_id = &ifp_equipment_types;.equipment_type_id
AND &ifp_location_equipment;.equipment_id = &ifp_equipment;.equipment_id
AND &ifp_locations;.location_id = &ifp_location_equipment;.location_id AND &ifp_locations;.location_id=? ORDER BY equipment_id
